item.title: Elixir - Regex.match? or String.contains?
item.description: I was about to do a task in Elixir: check a short string if they contain another short string, ignoring the case of both strings.

item.title: Merging case classes in Scala
item.description: During a project I came across a requirement where I had to combine two case classes into one. This led me to look into various options on how we can achieve this.
